PackageOracle.name: DA_ACCOUNTING_SYSTEM
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_ACCOUNTING_SYSTEM
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.35.949099000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,holding_company_id IN NUMBER
,kma_id IN NUMBER
,gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,gl_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,holding_company_id IN NUMBER
,kma_id IN NUMBER
,gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,gl_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,accounting_system_id IN NUMBER
,holding_company_id IN NUMBER
,kma_id IN NUMBER
,gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,gl_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,accounting_system_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_accounting_system;

body.name: DA_ACCOUNTING_SYSTEM
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_ACCOUNTING_SYSTEM
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.35.960567000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,holding_company_id IN NUMBER
,kma_id IN NUMBER
,gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,gl_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_accounting_system.add(fx), parms=' || holding_company_id || '|' || kma_id || '|' || gl_id || '|' || gl_desc || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_accounting_system a
(
a.accounting_system_id
,a.holding_company_id
,a.kma_id
,a.gl_id
,a.gl_desc
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_accounting_system_id.NEXTVAL
,add.holding_company_id
,add.kma_id
,add.gl_id
,add.gl_desc
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.accounting_system_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_accounting_system.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,holding_company_id IN NUMBER
,kma_id IN NUMBER
,gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,gl_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_accounting_system.add, parms=' || holding_company_id || '|' || kma_id || '|' || gl_id || '|' || gl_desc || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_accounting_system a
(
a.accounting_system_id
,a.holding_company_id
,a.kma_id
,a.gl_id
,a.gl_desc
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_accounting_system_id.NEXTVAL
,add.holding_company_id
,add.kma_id
,add.gl_id
,add.gl_desc
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_accounting_system.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,accounting_system_id IN NUMBER
,holding_company_id IN NUMBER
,kma_id IN NUMBER
,gl_id IN VARCHAR2
,gl_desc IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_accounting_system.add, parms=' || accounting_system_id || '|' || holding_company_id || '|' || kma_id || '|' || gl_id || '|' || gl_desc || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_accounting_system a
(
a.accounting_system_id
,a.holding_company_id
,a.kma_id
,a.gl_id
,a.gl_desc
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.accounting_system_id
,add.holding_company_id
,add.kma_id
,add.gl_id
,add.gl_desc
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_accounting_system.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,accounting_system_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_accounting_system.del, parms=' || accounting_system_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_accounting_system a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.accounting_system_id = del.accounting_system_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_accounting_system.del');

END del;

END da_accounting_system;
